com.tyrlib2.graphics.lighting

Class DirectionalLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tyrlib2.graphics.scene.SceneObject
      • com.tyrlib2.graphics.lighting.Light
        • com.tyrlib2.graphics.lighting.DirectionalLight

  • public class DirectionalLight
extends Light
    Represents a directional light. Emits light into the specified position. The emitted light has an infinite range.
    Author:
    Sascha
